articles.title: WFP Says Has Depleted All Gaza Food Stocks As Israel Blocks Aid
articles.description: The UN's World Food Programme said Friday it had depleted its food stocks in war-ravaged Gaza where Israel has blocked all aid for more than seven weeks.
